= Introduction =
Nearly every Salesforce org needs to convert leads. Either they have a business process that includes Leads, or they're using Web to Lead to get Contacts into their database.

= Current State = 
Lead conversion doesn't work as might be expected in the one-to-one Account model. The Lead conversion interface is not shown when converting a one-to-one lead.

= Problems with current State =

 * an Opportunity cannot be created when converting a Lead in the one-to-one model.
 * Leads can't be merged to existing Contacts
